Translations.Text: Any unu de vi obe DI His messenger plumb righteous life ni grant her double recompense ni prepar her generous provision

O wives de prophet vi est sam as any ali women se vi observ righteousness! (Vi hav greater responsibility.) Do vi ne parol tro softly lest those disease en their kor get wrong ide; vi parol nur righteousness

Vi sald down your hejm do ne mingle popol excessively vi uz do en old tag ignorance! Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) obe DI His messenger! DI wishes remove all unholiness EL VI O VI viv SANKT Shrine purify VI completely
Memor ki recited your hejm de di revelations wisdom inherent therein! DI EST Sublime Cognizant

submitting hom submitting women kred hom kred women obedient hom obedient women truthful hom truthful women steadfast hom steadfast women reverent hom reverent women charitable hom charitable women fast hom fast women cxast hom cxast women hom commemorate DI frequently commemorating women DI prepar them forgiveness great recompense
ne kred hom kred woman se DI His messenger issue any ordon hav any choice regarding ke ordon! Anyone disobeys DI His messenger ir far astray

Recall vi dir al unu ben DI ben vi Keep your wife reverence DI vi kasx yourself ki DI wished proklam! Tiel vi tim popol when vi supoz tim nur DI! When Zeid est completely his wife ni hav vi marry her en ord establ precedent ke hom marry divorced wife his adopted fil. Di ordon done
prophet ne committing error doing anything far lawful DI! Such est di sistem fru generaci. Di ordon est sankt duty
Those liver di messages who reverence Him sol neniam tim anyone DI! DI est PLEJ efficient reckoner
Muhammad ne est patr any hom vi. Li est messenger DI final prophet. DI est fully aware da all AJX
O vi kred vi memor DI frequently
Vi glor Him tag kaj nokt
Li est Unu help vi together His angxel plumb vi out da darkness into light Li est Merciful towards believers
Their greeting tag ili meet Him est Pac Li prepar them generous recompense
O prophet ni send vi witness bearer bon news tro warner
Invit DI en accordance kun His vol direkt beacon
Liver bon news believers ili ind DI great ben
Ne obe disbelievers hypocrites disregard their insult put your fid DI; DI suffices advokat
O vi kred vi married kred women tiam divorced them antaux hav intercourse them ili ne sxuld vi any waiting interim (antaux marrying another hom)! Vi kompens them equitably let them amicably

O prophet ni far lawful vi your wives al whom vi pag their due dowry ki vi jam as granted vi DI! Ankaux lawful por vi en marriage est daughters your patr frat daughters your patr sisters daughters your mother's frat daughters your mother's sisters emigrated vi. Ankaux se kred woman don prophet - Per forfeiting dowry! - prophet marry her dowry li tial wishes Tamen sxi forfeiting de dowry aplik nur al prophet ne al ali believers. Ni jam dekret their dekstr en regard their spouses ki ili jam hav. This est sxpar vi any embaras. DI est Forgiver Merciful
